 2024-07032024-06-17JUS
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE MYRIAM LACHANCE, a Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec for the district of Montréal, to be a puisne Judge of the Court of Appeal of Quebec, with residence in the territory of Ville de Montréal or in the immediate vicinity thereof.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of the HONOURABLE MYRIAM LACHANCE, a Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec for the district of Montréal, to be a puisne Judge of the Court of Appeal of Quebec, with residence in the territory of Ville de Montréal or in the immediate vicinity thereof.
